comments:
I've created new project "DPAG Manual work" with non-default location (the 
same name of directory, but out of default workspace).
The project was successfully created, but message 

Kind	Status	Priority	Description	Resource	In Folder
	Location
Error			Unable to read 'DPAG Manual work/.classpath' file.
	DPAG Manual work		Build path

appeared in the task view. The file is presented though.
I've double clicked on plugin.xml and added dependency to another plugin. 
Saved. Error message about .classpath disappear.
Double clicked on plugin.xml of another already existing PDE project - Eclipse 
hung forever.
Had to terminate Eclipse from Task Manager.
After restart, I get permanent message that .classpath can't be read (again 
the file is there and I can open it from Navigator without problems).
In log the following NPE was found
